name: @turingdynamics/ultrawealth-platform
description: Multi-tenant wealth visibility platform with hard tenant isolation and governance enforcement

scripts.governance:check: npm run governance:advisory && npm run governance:execution && npm run governance:sor
scripts.governance:advisory: grep -rn --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -E 'recommend|suggest|optimise|optimize' platform/ tenants/ api/ && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.governance:execution: grep -rn --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -E 'placeOrder|submitTrade|executeTrade' platform/ tenants/ api/ && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.governance:sor: grep -rn --include='*.ts' --include='*.tsx' -E 'updateBalance|setBalance|journalEntry' platform/ tenants/ api/ && exit 1 || exit 0

author: TuringDynamics
